content.body: I see the “Change Array by copy“ proposal https://tc39.es/proposal-change-array-by-copy/ seems to have been implemented (and shipped?) in Firefox — https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1729563. Has it been implemented in any other browser engines yet?
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: I see the “Change Array by copy“ proposal https://tc39.es/proposal-change-array-by-copy/ seems to have been implemented (and shipped?) in Firefox — https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1729563. Has it been implemented in any other browser engines yet?

content.body:
I think it is still behind a compile time flag in Firefox.
It has started to ship in Safari tech preview. But the spec has changed (and could change again) since it was implemented there
